name: Songbird
summary: Step into the spotlight and transform your living room into a vibrant stage with Songbird! Whether you're a seasoned performer or having fun with friends, this immersive singing experience delivers the thrill of karaoke directly to your home. From the musical minds behind Guitar Hero, immerse yourself in a fantasy world that is the first ever Karaoke game in VR. Songbird is the ultimate choice for music lovers and VR enthusiasts alike.

videos.name: Trailer
